price: 16. Kuwa ka dooda Arrinka Alle inta la ajiibay kaddib, xujadoodu qiimo kuma fadhido Rabbigood agti11, dushoodana Cadho (Alle) baa ah, waxayna leeyihiin Cadaab Daran.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآجُّونَ فِي ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ٱسۡتُجِيبَ لَهُۥ حُجَّتُهُمۡ دَاحِضَةٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَلَيۡهِمۡ غَضَبٞ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٌ
footnotes: 11. Kaddib markay dadku aqbaleen Xaqa ka yimid Alle, waxayna isku dayaan gaalada inay ka weecshaan mu’miniinta xagga Diinta Islaamka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yuḥājjūna fī al-lahi min baʿdi mā us'tujība lahu ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍatun ʿinda rabbihim waʿalayhim ghaḍabun walahum ʿadhābun shadīdun
translations: response has been made to Him
response has been made to Him
